author: quinnanm
body:
#### PR description:

This is a backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44054 to update the AXOL1TL emulator to be consistent with new [utm grammar v0_12_0](https://globaltrigger.web.cern.ch/globaltrigger/release/utm/latest_doc/html/releaseNotes/v0_12_0.html) and menu as of L1Menu_Collisions2024_v1_0_1_xml. Changes are identical to [44054](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44054)  See: https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/update-of-the-2024-l1-menu-tag-l1menu-collisions2024-v1-0-1/36759. 

#### PR validation:

This must be tested and merged together with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9065 and upcoming backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44389.

Passes basic code formats and checks. 

backport of [44054](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44054) to 14_0_X
title: [14_0_X backport] Get AXOL1TL model version from menu as of utm v0.12.0
